summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 3.9°C) and outside temperature (down 2.6°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 725 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1424 m), feels like temperature (up 5.9°C), outside temperature (up 4.2°C), and inside temperature (up 1.6°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 724.8m lower than yesterday, 557.9m lower than the past week, 1424.3m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 745m and a high of 3580m, averaging 1261.7m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.
cloud levels.summary: Partial cloudiness with some periods of sun.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; mild temperatures are expected. Also, humidity should not be a concern. Chance of light rain, partial cloudiness with some periods of sun, and the light is absent. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
